column9: What it is: A collection of purse-size, pigment-powered eyeshadow palettes made to mesmerize?ùand collect.What it does: Each Cover Shots palette has a curated mix of colors, formulas, and finishes so you can nail the latest trends and create your own looks. Each portable palette includes six eyeshadows and two double-size base shades in a range of finishes. The shades give you intense pigment payoff and superior blendability and were inspired by makeup trends seen and shot at Smashbox?ÇÖs LA creative photo studio.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- ParabensWhat else you need to know: These versatile makeup palettes are curated to spark your creativity with customizable eye looks using the season?ÇÖs most-coveted colors. Find your vibe within every eyeshadow palette (sold separately): Punked (wearable-to-rebellious looks): Cause a riot with a mix of cool, grunge-inspired grays, warm mauves, nudes, and punched-up purples in vixeny velvets and shimmers. It?ÇÖs everything you need for a range of wearable-to-rebellious looks.Ablaze (hot, desert-inspired shades): With shades in rich red clay and hot terra cotta, this palette captures the warmth of the desert in a range of sun-drenched shades?ùthese dimensional pigments are perfect for adding depth and contouring.Golden Hour (creamy, lit-from-within shades): This palette?ÇÖs finishes range from matte to sparkle, and the sultry, golden shades are rich and creamy so you can blend and build a custom smolder. Matte (high coverage, velvety): This palette offers mattes that never fall flat. It?ÇÖs lush, soft, and velvety with ultra-high coverage, and includes matte eyeshadow shades in warm nudes, cool mauves, and a deep, dramatic black.Smoky (effortless and modern): Perfect for creating a smoky eye, these mid-to-darker tones amp up intensity with a blend of matte, low shimmers, and high-shimmer shades. Softlight (soft-focus, wearable shimmers): The ultra-flattering hues include champagne and ros??-inspired colors to highlight the eyes with low-level shimmer for a subtle shine that goes on smoothly for a glowing look.Pinks & Palms (fiercely feminine looks): This high-pigment, limited-edition palette mixes mattes, metallics, shimmering pinks, sunlit gold tones, and a hint of mint. It?ÇÖs perfect for creating a fiercely feminine look inspired by soft, pink LA skies.  Major Metals (hyper-reflective metallic shades):Spoil your lids with fit-for-a-queen coppers, royal maroons, and brilliant bronzes. These shadows have a creamy powder formula that glides on a molten metallic finish in one swipe.  Minimalist (effortlessly versatile neutrals):Create countless looks with minimal effort. This neutral mix of ultra-blendable mattes and shimmers creates no-makeup makeup looks, contours lids, and effortlessly blends a smoky eye.  Prism (planetary pastels):These creamy, pastel powders create a spectrum of one-swipe holographic looks. The palette includes 2 duo-chrome shade transformers to give any shadow a game-changing, sparkly finish.  Petal Metal (petal-soft rose-gold shades):This wearable rainbow of petal-soft, rose gold glides on in one swipe. Each shade beautifully blooms to create effortless, matte day looks and sultry metallic evening looks!  Bold Glitter (daring & vibrant glitter):A colorful range of saturated shades with an insanely sparkly finish. Layer them over mattes or rock them solo?Çöthese shadows are designed to shine!  This product is cruelty-free, and is formulated without sodium lauryl sulfate or fragrance.
column10:
Live for lipstick? Won?ÇÖt pose without primer? Smashbox is a beauty brand born in an L.A. photo studio. Their cruelty-free makeup is made to stand up to hot lights, long days, and real life?Çöso you look good in any light and every photo.
Visit the Smashbox boutique

column2: Just Peachy Mattes Eyeshadow Palette ?Çô Peaches and Cream Collection
column9:
What it is:A long-wearing eyeshadow palette with 12 highly-pigmented, matte hues for endless eye looks. 
What it does:Featuring matte shades of warm peaches, buttery creams, and rich browns, these shadows are infused with exclusive comfort matte technology for blendable, intense color-payoff.
?£ö Glides on buildable, saturated color
?£ö Delivers a matte finish
?£ö Features an ombr?? layout for easy transitions
?£ö Smells like peaches and cream
This palette contains:12 x Eyeshadow in Peach Meringue (ivory), Peach Tea (caramel), Peach Cobbler (toasted peach), Peach Tart (deep brown), Peach Butter (peach cream), Just Peachy (matte peach), Peach Punch (peach daiquiri), Just Ripe (spiced plum), Peaches and Cream (peach sherbet), Fresh-Picked (ginger peach), Peach Sangria (wine), Chocolate Dipped (smoky brown)	
- Step-by-step how-to glamour guide 
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
What else you need to know:For the first time in Too Faced history, they?ÇÖve created an entire line exclusively for Sephora. The Too Faced Peaches and Cream Comfort Matte Collection is infused with refreshing peaches and sweet fig milk?ùingredients known for their hydrating and antioxidant-rich benefits?ùto help keep skin moisturized, comfortable, and beautifully matte.
Beauty tip:No liner? No problem! Use a liner brush with any of the darker shades.
column10:
?Ç£There was a time in the ?Çÿ90s when darkness was all the rage and pink had a bad rep. 
Enter: Jerrod Blandino and Jeremy Johnson. 
Inspired by a love of Paris and the transformative power of cosmetics, they created Too Faced, a boutique brand with big dreams. They invented one of the world?ÇÖs first glitter eyeshadows; Lip Injection, a revolutionary instant and long-term plumping lip gloss; and Better Than Sex, the number-one-selling prestige mascara in America. Today, Too Faced is a leader in the beauty industry, creating innovative, cruelty-free cosmetics people love to wear.?Ç¥
Visit the Too Faced boutique

column9: What it is: An eyeshadow palette featuring 14 whimsical shades ranging from bold and bright mattes to soft pastel shimmers.What it does: Anastasia Beverly Hills?ÇÖ president, Norvina Soare, designed this palette to be her personal go-to, with 14 dreamy, easy-to-blend shades. The buttery, full-pigment formula means you only need minimal product for maximum payoff. It comes luxuriously packaged with a large mirror and double-ended brush. This set contains:- 14 x 0.02 oz/ 0.74 g Eyeshadows in Dreamer (metallic pink champagne), Base (matte eggshell), Summer (metallic foiled golden topaz), Soul (matte wisteria), Wild Child (duo-chrome frosty pink with a magenta shift), Incense (matte dusty terracotta), Rose Gold (metallic rosewood), Love (matte mid-tone cool pink), Celestial (duo-chrome plum with a violet shift), Volatile (matte warm charcoal), Dazzling (duo-chrome cool-tone bronze with a violet shift), Eccentric (matte dark burnt orange), Drama (duo-chrome aubergine with a cool bronze shift), Passion (matte deep garnet)What else you need to know: ?Ç£I have always wanted to create a palette that embodies my spirit. I?ÇÖm a dreamer at heart and get lost in my own fantasy world daily. It?ÇÖs a whimsical place that leaves you feeling carefree. column9: What it is: A two-tiered eye palette with two coveted formulas to create a lustrous and seductive eye look.What it does: The Cream and Powder Eye Color features a Base Eye Color and Eye Color for warm-weather looks. column2: Kajal Ink Artist Shadow, Liner, Brow
column9: What it is: A four-in-one liner, kajal, eyeshadow, and brow color that creates a striking look with bold, 12-hour waterproof wear, an even glide, and a weightless feel.What it does: This four-in-one eye pencil acts as a liner, kajal, eyeshadow, and brow color. It?ÇÖs perfect for anyone who wants to make a graphic statement with bold liner, lids, and brows. The smudge-proof, crease-proof, waterproof, and tear-proof formula provides high-impact pigment with an even glide and a featherweight feel. Its soft, graduated point is precise enough to create a thin, smooth band along the inner rim of the eye, and also wide enough to be easily swathed across the entire lid. A detachable sharpener maintains the tip for ultimate precision, while a built-in sponge can be used to blend for a seamless, smoky finish. It?ÇÖs available in eight shades inspired by both ancient and modern Japan.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: This product is dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested. It is free of oil, fragrance, and talc.

column9: What it is: A crease-proof liquid eyeshadow that comes in a range of finishes and delivers up to 16 hours of high-impact color with a no-makeup feel.What Else You Need to Know: This beauty breakthrough features a buildable, water-infused formula that glides on smoothly and blends easily, no primer required. Giorgio Armani translates his sense of fashion and his aesthetic vision into the world of fragrances, make-up and skincare. Elegance is key: beauty, simplicity and quality are delivered through products made from the finest materials, designed to convey an understated and timeless sophistication.

column9: What it is: A wardrobe of textures and dazzling hues that come together in a couture color palette presented in a luxe, lacquered case. What it does: This curated collection of richly pigmented, velvety hues features vivid jewel tones, classic neutrals, and high-impact fashion shades that glide on smoothly to highlight, line, and define eyes for unlimited looks. The hybrid cream-infused powder formulations release infinitely smooth and extremely blendable pigments for seamless color transitions with unprecedented buildability. The perfect balance of gorgeous finishes and intense shades structure, design, and define eyes with crystalline pearl flashes and thrilling color effects. Beam beyond the spectrum and paint with light to accentuate and highlight the natural beauty of the face. Ten richly pigmented hues include fiery coppers, poetic pinks, polymorphic jewels, brilliant bronze and iconic matte neutrals.This palette contains:- 10 x Eyeshadows in Skinshow Glow (champagne pink pearl), Copper Toned (soft reddish brown), Iconic (neutral bronze gold), Rose Dusk (soft reddish mauve), Dark (rich warm brown), Xtreme Black (ultimate black), Bronze 005 (metallic warm brown), Astral Ghost Orchid (white iridescent with pink), VR Nectar (peachy pink with gold pearl), Blitz Emerald (blackened green with lilac pearl)

column9: What it is: A beautiful assortment of fun-size eyeshadow palettes with serious pigment. This gentle cleansing foam restores and balances the skin with rosewater, while cooling cucumber extract helps calm the complexion. The soap-free formula dissolves dirt and everyday impurities without stripping the skin of essential moisture. The formula is further enriched with evening primrose extract, which supports natural collagen, and plum seed oil, which helps hydrate and maintain your healthy glow.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: "One of the most recognizable flowers across cultures, the rose is associated with romance and royalty and has been the basis of beauty rituals for centuries. Ancient Roman courts were decorated with garlands to stimulate the senses, and queens from Cleopatra to Marie Antoinette used it for perfume. With today?ÇÖs technology, we are able to refine the purity of the extract, making it even more effective in skin care. The flower yields an incredibly precious oil brimming with nutrients that help to hydrate, soothe, tone, and restore the skin, and the scent adds a unique mood-enhancing quality to the experience."?ùLev Glazman, Fresh Co-founderResearch results:In an independent consumer test:- 97% said it gently cleansed the skin without irritating it- 93% noticed toned, healthier-looking skin- 87% felt it was balancing- 83% reported a comforting effect and more supple skin

Free of SLS, fragrance, and essential oils, Beste?äó No. 9  is totally non-irritating, non-sensitizing, and appropriate for all skin.           Solutions for:- Oiliness- Makeup removal
If you want to know more?ÇªWith a unique blend of mild surfactants and makeup-dissolving emollients, this gentle formula rinses away without an ounce of residue, leaving skin clean and soft.
What else you need to know:Beste?äó No. 9 is formulated at an ideal, non-stripping pH level of 5.5. 100 percent free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance. 
Note: In Afrikaans, Beste means Best. Even though the first eight versions weren?ÇÖt exactly that, Drunk Elephant thinks they?ÇÖve finally found the best one yet. They are calling it Beste?äó No. 9 after going through nine formulations to get there! Only the Beste will do.
Note from Tiffany Masterson, Drunk Elephant Founder: "We took your feedback about the original Beste and made some changes?ùwe swapped out the twist top packaging for a trusty flip top and tweaked the formula so it?ÇÖs gentle enough to use on eyes (and remove every last trace of makeup)."
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin?ÇÖs health or support the integrity and effectiveness of our formulations. They never take into account an ingredient?ÇÖs synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on its biocompatibility. You won?ÇÖt find what they call the "Suspicious 6" in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical screens, fragrance/dyes, and SLS,) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see. When formulating the products, they focus on pH levels and safety, and always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels. This is the Drunk Elephant difference.Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.Awards:- Oprah Magazine, September 2017 Beauty O-Ward- Self Magazine, 2018 Self Healthy Beauty Award- Cosmopolitan Magazine, 2018 Cosmopolitan Skin Award- Tatal Beauty, 2018 Editor's Pick Honorable Mention AwardClean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see and when entirely removed from one?ÇÖs routine (?Ç£a clean break?Ç¥), skin can reset and return to a healthy, balanced state. It is equally, if not more, important what we leave out of the products as what we put in. This ingredient-elimination diet inspired the #barewithus Instagram movement, a collection of bare-faced selfies chronicling the Drunk Elephant journeys of people who have found success using the line and renewed confidence in their own skin. column9: Which skin type is it good for??£ö Normal?£ö Oily?£ö Combination?£ö SensitiveWhat it is:A daily gel cleanser with natural fruit exfoliant that thoroughly but gently lifts impurities and unclogs pores while leaving skin soft and hydrated.Solutions for:- Pores- Dullness and uneven texture- OilinessIf you want to know more?Çª The Deep Cleanse oil-free gel lathers into a creamy foam to lift away dirt, oil, and impurities without over-drying. It cleanses with amino acids derived from silk gentle enough for even the most delicate skin, leaving skin soft, refreshed, and comfortably hydrated.  The formula harnesses the power of the Japanese luffa fruit, a natural beauty multitasker beloved by Japanese women for centuries. Ground fibers from the fruit exfoliate, helping to turn over dead skin cells while purifying and decongesting pores. The fruit extract also beautifies and conditions skin. Japanese wild rose works to visibly tighten pores and smooth skin texture, while Japanese leopard lily helps minimize excess oil.What else you need to know: Harvested under a full autumn moon, the water of luffa fruit has been prized as a favorite natural skincare ingredient in Japan since the Edo period. It is beloved for its clarifying and moisturizing properties. When dried and ground, the fruit gently exfoliates to purify and smooth skin texture?ùthe original inspiration for the modern day loofah sponge. The Deep Cleanse harnesses this time-tested ingredient in this refreshing, easy-to-use daily exfoliating cleanser.This pure, oil-free formula is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, of TEA.This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls?ÇÖ education around the world. column2: Pure One Step Camellia Oil Cleanser
column9:
Which skin type is it good for??£ö Normal?£ö Oily?£ö Combination?£ö Dry?£ö SensitiveWhat it is:A two-in-one makeup remover and cleanser with camellia oil that gently melts away impurities, even waterproof makeup, leaving behind pure, silky soft skin.Solutions for:- Dryness- Fine lines and wrinkles- Dullness and uneven textureIf you want to know more?ÇªPure One Step Camellia Cleansing Oil thoroughly cleanses the skin without stripping natural moisture, leaving it balanced and nourished. It does not contain mineral oil, so the liquid emulsifies completely and leaves no residue. 
Japanese camellia oil (tsubaki) is richer in oleic acid than olive oil and an excellent source of vitamins A, B, D, and E and nourishing Omegas 3, 6, and 9.
What else you need to know: Anko, the camellia-harvesting women of Oshima Island were famed for their glowing skin and long, lustrous hair. Geisha discovered their secret was the oil from the seeds of the winter-blooming camellia flower and used it for centuries to remove their iconic stage makeup without drying or damaging the skin.?áTatcha has advanced this treasure in the Pure One Step Camellia Cleansing Oil.This product is noncomedogenic, non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. If you want to know more?Çª
 This luxurious cleanser made with Greek yogurt is rich in proteins, minerals, and vitamins to gently cleanse while nourishing?ùleaving skin soft and supple, and reducing redness. The formula also easily removes makeup and impurities without irritation. The cleanser includes amaranth seed extract to soothe, as well as calming honeysuckle to provide antibacterial benefits.

What else you need to know:
 An ingredient used for centuries in Greece for its smoothing and strengthening properties, Greek yogurt contains two and a half times the protein of regular yogurt. By boosting your skin care routine with protein-rich Greek yogurt, you deliver the same benefits to your skin that protein delivers to your body?ùhelping to nourish, strengthen, and repair. In Greece, this cherished ingredient is used by families and villages for their own unique recipes and beauty remedies that have been passed down from generation to generation. In 2003, KORRES became the world's first brand to incorporate edible Greek yogurt into a skincare formula.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free. What Else You Need to Know: Infused with blueberry extract, marula oil, and honey, Pekee tones and promotes moisture retention for skin that feels firmer and more elastic. Pekee is fragrance- and soap-free and at an ideal pH level of 6.5 to cleanse and calm without drying or stripping skin it of its protective barrier. Drunk Elephant difference:Drunk Elephant is clean, but in their opinion, "clean" is not enough when it comes to caring for skin. They make "Clean Compatible" skincare. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin?ÇÖs health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient?ÇÖs synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on biocompatibility. You won?ÇÖt find what they call the "Suspicious 6" in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see, and when entirely removed from one?ÇÖs routine, ("a clean break"), skin can reset and return to a healthy, balanced state. It is equally, if not more, important what they leave out of the products as what they put in. This ingredient-elimination diet (think Whole30 for your face) inspired the #barewithus Instagram movement, a collection of bare-faced selfies chronicling the Drunk Elephant journeys of people who have found success using the line and renewed confidence in their own skin. When formulating their products, Drunk Elephant focuses on biocompatibility, pH levels, and safety, always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels and remain respectful and always supportive of skin?ÇÖs acid mantle.Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

column9: What it is:  An ultra-mild, multitasking bar that deeply cleanses and subtly exfoliates without fragrance or soap.Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Skin Texture, OilinessFormulation: BarHighlighted Ingredients:- Heilmoor Clay: Thermal mud that tones and detoxifies the skin.- Virgin Marula Oil: Super-absorbable oil, high in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9, that helps nourish and rejuvenate skin.- Bamboo Powder: Tiny, smooth spheres that gently exfoliate away dead, dry skin. Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free. What Else You Need to Know: Infused with thermal mud, marula, bamboo, and superfruit, Juju dissolves pore-clogging excess oil, surface debris, and impurities while gently exfoliating for softer, smoother skin with improved clarity. Juju is fragrance and soap-free and at a pH level of 6.3 to cleanse without drying or stripping.Drunk Elephant difference:Drunk Elephant is clean, but in their opinion, "?Ç£clean"?Ç¥ is not enough when it comes to caring for skin. They make "?Ç£Clean Compatible"?Ç¥ skincare. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin?ÇÖs health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient?ÇÖs synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on biocompatibility. You won?ÇÖt find what they call the "?Ç£Suspicious 6"?Ç¥ in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see, and when entirely removed from one?ÇÖs routine, ("?Ç£a clean break"?Ç¥), skin can reset and return to a healthy, balanced state. It is equally, if not more, important what they leave out of the products as what they put in. This ingredient-elimination diet (think Whole30 for your face) inspired the #barewithus Instagram movement, a collection of bare-faced selfies chronicling the Drunk Elephant journeys of people who have found success using the line and renewed confidence in their own skin. When formulating their products, Drunk Elephant focuses on biocompatibility, pH levels, and safety, always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels and remain respectful and always supportive of skin?ÇÖs acid mantle.Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

column9: What it is:  A baby Juju Bar and Pekee Bar?äó in a bright, durable case.Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and ElasticityFormulation: Bar SoapHighlighted Ingredients:- Virgin Marula Oil: Hydrates, protects, and rejuvenates the skin; high in antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9.   - Heilmoor Clay: Tones and detoxifies the skin.   - Blueberry Extract: Potent antioxidant with soothing and anti-glycation properties. Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.What Else You Need to Know: Mild cleansing bars that leave no residue behind. Pekee Bar?äó is a gentle multitasker with a 6.5 pH-level that clarifies, balances, and moisturizes, and removes surface debris, impurities, and excess oil. Juju Bar is an ultra-mild multitasker with a 6.3 pH-level that deeply cleanses and subtly exfoliates.Drunk Elephant Difference: Drunk Elephant is clean, but in their opinion, ?Ç£clean?Ç¥ is not enough when it comes to caring for skin. They make ?Ç£Clean Compatible?Ç¥skincare. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin?ÇÖs health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient?ÇÖs synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on biocompatibility. You won?ÇÖt find what they call the ?Ç£Suspicious 6?Ç¥ in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see and when entirely removed from one?ÇÖs routine (?Ç£a clean break?Ç¥), skin can reset and return to a healthy, balanced state. It is equally, if not more, important what we leave out of the products as what we put in. This ingredient-elimination diet inspired the #barewithus Instagram movement, a collection of bare-faced selfies chronicling the Drunk Elephant journeys of people who have found success using the line and renewed confidence in their own skin. When formulating the products, they focus on biocompatibility, pH levels, and safety, always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels and remain respectful and always supportive of skin?ÇÖs acid mantle.Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.This Set Contains:- 30 g/ 1 oz Travel-size Pekee Bar?äó- 30 g/ 1 oz Travel-size Juju BarClinical Results: In an independent consumer testing panel of 101 women ages 25 to 55 using Pekee Bar?äó:- 96% agreed skin was thoroughly cleansed- 92% agreed skin was clean of all makeup - 85% agreed skin felt soft and smooth - 84% found skin was firmer and more balanced- 81% found Pekee Bar?äó was calming and soothing - 81% agreed skin appeared more youthfulIn an independent consumer testing panel of 101 women ages 25 to 55 using JuJu Bar:- 95% found skin felt completely cleansed of impurities and excess oil- 95% agreed skin felt balanced- 94% found it effectively exfoliated skin- 93% agreed skin looked clarified and felt healthier- 92% found skin felt softer and smoother- 92% agreed it was perfect for their skin type  Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. column9:
Which skin type is it good for??£ö Normal?£ö Oily?£ö Combination?£ö DryWhat it is:A Juju Bar and Pekee Bar?äó as a travel-sized duo.Solutions for:- Deep cleansing- Uneven skin tone and texture- Dullness and brighteningIf you want to know more?Çª The JuJu Bar is a multitasking exfoliating bar designed to effectively cleanse while gently removing dead skin cells from the surface of the skin. Uniquely formulated with thermal mud and bamboo powder, Juju Bar creates a creamy lather that dissolves unwanted oil, rinsing away pore-clogging surface debris and any impurities. It refines skin texture, brightens skin clarity, and helps minimize the look of pores. Truly in a league of its own, Pekee Bar?äó is a gentle cleansing bar that moisturizes, clarifies, and balances the complexion. Infused with a blend of blueberry extract, marula oil, and honey, Pekee Bar tones and promotes moisture retention.This set contains:- 1 oz/ 30 g Pekee Bar?äó- 1 oz/ 30 g Juju Bar What else you need to know:  Unlike soap, which has a pH level of nine or above, the JuJu Bar and Pekee Bar are formulated with skin-friendly ingredients designed to cleanse and soothe the skin. The Juju Bar has an ideal pH-level of 6.3 and Pekee Bar is at 6.3 to ensure sufficient cleansing without drying or stripping the skin of its protective barrier. Both are free of soap, fragrance, essential oil, silicone, and irritant. Juju Bar is vegan.Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin?ÇÖs health or support the integrity and effectiveness of our formulations. They never take into account an ingredient?ÇÖs synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on its biocompatibility. You won?ÇÖt find what they call the "Suspicious 6" in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical screens, fragrance/dyes, and SLS,) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see. When formulating the products, they focus on pH levels and safety, and always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels. This is the Drunk Elephant difference. 
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free. 
Research results: In an independent consumer testing panel of 101 women ages 25 to 55 using Pekee Bar:- 96% agreed skin was thoroughly cleansed- 92% agreed skin was clean of all makeup - 85% agreed skin felt soft and smooth - 84% found skin was firmer and more balanced- 81% found Pekee Bar was calming and soothing - 81% agreed skin appeared more youthful In an independent consumer testing panel of 101 women ages 25 to 55 using JuJu Bar:- 95% found skin felt completely cleansed of impurities and excess oil- 95% agreed skin felt balanced- 94% found it effectively exfoliated skin- 93% agreed skin looked clarified and felt healthier- 92% found skin felt softer and smoother- 92% agreed it was perfect for their skin type Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. What else you need to know:
"When I was two, living in a small town in Eastern Siberia, I tipped over a pot of boiling water. My arm was badly burned, and I was rushed to a doctor who treated me with a pasty orange salve that I later learned was seaberry oil. Extracted from a plant native to Russia and the Himalayan region known for thriving in harsh conditions, this nourishing oil has been used for generations as a natural cure.?ùLev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder

Research results:
In an independent consumer testing panel, after applying product once a day for 28 consecutive days:
- 100% said it removed and dissolved makeup and impurities, leaving their skin clean and fresh
- 97% felt it deeply cleansed their skin and eyes and soothed their skin, leaving it soft, radiant, and healthy
- 97% reported that their skin was moisturized and protected from dryness
- 96% said it eliminated even the toughest waterproof makeup

column9: What it is:  A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to improve the look of skin?ÇÖs tone, texture, and firmness.Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and ElasticityHighlighted Ingredients:- Nine Signal Peptide Complex: Serves to bind moisture to skin to plump, firm, and restore bounce to skin?ÇÖs appearance, helping to support skin?ÇÖs natural self-renewal process. - Pygmy Waterlily Stem Cell Extract: Acts as an excellent source of antioxidants and nutrients to nurture the skin; it is extremely moisturizing, soothing, and calming and is effective in supporting healthy, youthful-looking skin. - Soybean Folic Acid Ferment Extract: A B vitamin that plays a central role in maintaining youthful, elastic skin; skin becomes actively thirsty for folic acid, especially after exposure to sun.  Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free. What Else You Need to Know: Protini restores younger, revived-looking skin. Lines, wrinkles, and sun damage appear reduced and skin feels strengthened and moisturized. Think of Protini like adding protein to your smoothie. Abundant with proteins and nutrients, it replenishes and restores skin to a strong, healthy state. Formulated at an ideal pH level of 4.0. Drunk Elephant is clean, but in their opinion, "clean" is not enough when it comes to caring for skin. They make "Clean Compatible" skincare. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin?ÇÖs health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient?ÇÖs synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on biocompatibility. You won?ÇÖt find what they call the "Suspicious 6" in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see, and when entirely removed from one?ÇÖs routine, ("a clean break"), skin can reset and return to a healthy, balanced state. It is equally, if not more, important what they leave out of the products as what they put in. This skin-elimination diet (think Whole30 for your face) inspired the #barewithus Instagram movement, a collection of bare-faced selfies chronicling the Drunk Elephant journeys of people who have found success using the line and renewed confidence in their own skin. When formulating their products, Drunk Elephant focuses on biocompatibility, pH levels, and safety, always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels and remain respectful and always supportive of skin?ÇÖs acid mantle. Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.Clinical Results:  In an independent consumer-testing panel of 50 women ages 25 to 55:- 100% agreed their skin felt replenished and nurtured - 97% agreed their skin felt moisturized- 97% agreed their skin texture felt soft and smooth Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

- Japanese Purple Rice: Packed with nutrients and known for its ability to survive any harsh environment, it has long been used to celebrate longevity and vitality; rich in anthocyanin, a strong antioxidant, it helps skin recover from and protect against stress, pollution, and UV damage for healthier-looking skin.  
- Okinawa Algae Blend and Hyaluronic Acid: Captures water to help replenish skin?ÇÖs natural moisture reservoir, immediately leaving skin soft, comforted, and deeply nourished; helps to replenish ceramides to ensure optimum skin barrier function, aiding in the reduction of future moisture loss, for skin that is visibly smooth and plump with hydration.

If you want to know more?ÇªThe Water Cream provides nutrient-rich, balanced hydration with the unique water-burst that breaks upon application to deliver nourishment without leaving skin sticky or greasy. It clarifies and refines skin with pure, powerful Japanese botanicals: Japanese wild rose visibly tightens pores and smooths skin texture; Japanese leopard lily helps control excess oil and purify skin by supporting natural skin turnover; and hadasei-3?ùan anti-aging trinity of green tea, rice, and algae?ùrestores healthy-looking radiance. The formula imparts a subtle, shine-free glow with a touch of 23-karat gold.

What else you need to know: Beauty icons for over 300 years, geisha adopted Japanese wild rose to create a refined, poreless-looking canvas underneath their makeup. The Water Cream has harnessed this potent botanical to honor the original makeup lover. This pure formula is noncomedogenic, non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA.

column9: What it is: A rescue cream infused with six rare African oils and a ceramide complex for intense moisture and replenishing barrier support. Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and OilySkincare Concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines, and WrinklesFormulation: Rich CreamHighlighted Ingredients:- Six Rare African Oil Blend: Nourshes, rejuvenates, and moisturizes.- Ceramides AP, EOP, and NP: Help soothe and maintain the moisture balance of skin while protecting against water loss.- Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer: Has a smaller molecular weight than hyaluronic acid and is able to deeply penetrate skin, delivering excellent hydration and reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. What Else You Need to Know: Additional ingredients sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer and antioxidant-rich fermented green tea release hydration, defend against everyday stressors, and combat signs of aging. With a pH level of 5.2, Lala Retro?äó has the luxurious texture of a rich face cream without feeling suffocating or heavy. Drunk Elephant is clean, but in their opinion, ?Ç£clean?Ç¥ is not enough when it comes to caring for skin. They make ?Ç£Clean Compatible?Ç¥ skincare. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin?ÇÖs health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient?ÇÖs synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on biocompatibility. You won?ÇÖt find what they call the ?Ç£Suspicious 6?Ç¥ in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, SLS) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see and when entirely removed from one?ÇÖs routine (?Ç£a clean break?Ç¥), skin can reset and return to a healthy, balanced state. It is equally, if not more, important what we leave out of the products as what we put in. This ingredient-elimination diet inspired the #barewithus Instagram movement, a collection of bare-faced selfies chronicling the Drunk Elephant journeys of people who have found success using the line and renewed confidence in their own skin. When formulating the products, they focus on biocompatibility, pH levels, and safety, always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels and remain respectful and always supportive of skin?ÇÖs acid mantle.Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

column9: What it is:  A next-generation retinol oil that boosts the look and feel of skin plumpness, while improving the appearance of wrinkles, redness, and pores for visibly younger-looking skin.Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and RednessFormulation: Lightweight OilHighlighted Ingredients:- Trans-Retinol Ester: Supports healthy skin with the power of retinoids, but without the irritation of traditional retinol; helps fight the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, promote skin elasticity, and stimulate surface exfoliation for clearer, smoother looking skin.- Blue Tansy and German Chamomile: Deep blue-green oils, rich in potent azulene; wonderful for soothing the look of surface redness.- Chia Seed Oil: The richest botanical source of omega 3; powerful source of ALA, which helps minimize the appearance of lines. Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free with recyclable packaging. What Else You Need to Know: Luna works throughout the night to deliver visibly youthful, luminous, even-toned skin by morning. Trans-Retinol ester reduces the appearance of pores and wrinkles, while visibly improving the signs of premature aging: fine lines, uneven texture, age spots, dryness, and dullness. It's balanced with blue tansy and German chamomile, which helps to soothe the appearance of with surface redness for a calm, even-toned complexion?ùwithout the irritation of traditional retinol.Clinical Results: Proven via in-vivo testing (silicone replicas) and expert visual grading; Luna Sleeping Night Oil is clinically proven to improve skin radiance, fine lines, and smoothness in 4 weeks. After an independent consumer testing panel used Luna Sleeping Night Oil for 4 weeks: - 100% felt the product absorbed well into the skin - 96% of women felt their skin looked brighter and more radiant - 96% of women felt their skin looked healthier and revitalized - 92% of women felt their skin tone looked more even, calmer, smoother - 92% would recommend Luna to a family member or friend - 88% felt their pores looked smaller - 85% felt their fine lines and wrinkles around the forehead were visibly improved

column9: What it is:  A green-to-beige color-correcting treatment that corrects redness and protects skin from UV damage and environmental aggressors.Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Redness, Dryness, Dullness and uneven textureFormulation: CreamSPF: 30Highlighted Ingredients:- Centella Asiatica Complex: Protects from environmental stressors causing sensitized skin.- Herbs Complex: Supports skin for a vibrant appearance.- Minerals Solution and Panthenol: Supports skin's moisture barrier.Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. The formula features Tiger Grass (Centella Asiatica) to help heal sensitive skin exhibiting inflammation, irritation or discomfort.The Cicapair?äó Collection is inspired by the true legend of Asian tigers, rolling in centella asiatica to heal their battle wounds. Also known as tiger grass, its medicinal use has been recognized for centuries. For generations, this active ingredient has also been recognized as a recovery system to help support wounded skin exhibiting inflammation, redness, or blemishes.This product is free from 10 harmful ingredients such as artificial fragrance or color, denatured alcohol, triethanolamine, sulfate-based surfactants, triclosan, mineral oil, propylene glycol, and DEA that causes skin irritation.

What it is: An all-in-one skin-perfecting night cream made with a natural retinol alternative to deeply hydrate and target fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots.   
Solutions for:
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Uneven skin tone
- Loss of firmness and elasticity
If you want to know more?Çª Say "hello results, goodbye retinol" with bakuchiol, a plant-based retinol alternative. At night, your skin goes into repair mode. This rich sleeping cream makes the most of that time, exfoliating the skin?ÇÖs surface to allow fresher skin to glow through. Formulated with a powerful concentration of AHAs and bakuchiol?ùa natural alternative to retinol?ùit fights all major signs of aging for an overnight skin transformation. It targets fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots. And, with edelweiss stem cell, a delicately beautiful and resilient flower that thrives in harsh conditions, this potent sleeping cream also helps visibly firm and improve elasticity. Deeply hydrate all night to face a new day with renewed skin?ùand a new Ole Glow?«! 
What else you need to know: After a good night?ÇÖs rest, your skin should look as refreshed as you feel. Ole created this potent transformative cream to be beauty sleep in a jar; by the time you say "good morning!" to your reflection, skin looks smoother, more youthful, and deeply hydrated. Ole was inspired by the dramatic age-fighting benefits retinol delivers, but wanted to find a natural alternative. He selected bakuchiol, derived from the Ayurvedic babchi herb, after learning that it delivers retinol-like youth-boosting benefits.

column2: C.E.O Vitamin C Rich Hydration Cream
column9:
Which skin type is it good for??£ö Normal?£ö Oily?£ö Combination?£ö Dry?£ö  Sensitive
What it is:A hydrating moisturizer that infuses skin with high-potency, advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate) to fight the first visible signs of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support.
Solutions for:- Fine lines and wrinkles- Dryness
If you want to know more?ÇªC.E.O. C + E Protect and Repair Moisturizer infuses five percent advanced, oxygen-stable tetrahexydecyl ascorbate (THD ascorbate) into the skin?ùthe gold standard form of vitamin C. THD ascorbate is the newer, clinically-proven, oil-soluble derivative of vitamin C, which penetrates better into the skin while being exceptionally stable against oxygenation.  With 5 percent THD ascorbate, this moisturizer is powerful at fighting the first visible signs of aging and restoring vital skin radiance, while being uniquely suitable for those with sensitive skin, as THD ascorbate is significantly less irritating than other forms of vitamin C. Once in the skin, it helps boost youthful-looking skin texture and volume, in addition to providing photostable, antioxidant support.
Blended with protective, anti-pollution expopolysaccharides and refining lime pearl extract, this formula visibly repairs the effects of aging, environmental stress, and pollution-induced damage. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
What else you need to know:THD ascorbate (tetrahexyldecyl ascorbate) is the superior form of vitamin C. It is more stable and less irritating than ascorbic acid and other vitamin C derivatives.

Appropriate for all skin types, including very sensitive skin, this oil contains high concentrations of polyphenols to deliver antioxidant defense against pollution and free radicals.Free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.Drunk Elephant difference:Drunk Elephant is clean, but in their opinion, "clean" is not enough when it comes to caring for skin. They make "Clean Compatible" skincare. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin?ÇÖs health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient?ÇÖs synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on biocompatibility. You won?ÇÖt find what they call the "Suspicious 6" in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see, and when entirely removed from one?ÇÖs routine, ("a clean break"), skin can reset and return to a healthy, balanced state. It is equally, if not more, important what they leave out of the products as what they put in. This ingredient-elimination diet (think Whole30 for your face) inspired the #barewithus Instagram movement, a collection of bare-faced selfies chronicling the Drunk Elephant journeys of people who have found success using the line and renewed confidence in their own skin. When formulating their products, Drunk Elephant focuses on biocompatibility, pH levels, and safety, always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels and remain respectful and always supportive of skin?ÇÖs acid mantle.Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.Clinical Results: In an independent consumer testing panel of 101 women age 25 to 55:- 97% agreed Marula Oil was gentle and non-irritating, and left skin feeling moisturized- 94% agreed skin felt softer and nourished- 90% agreed skin felt rejuvenated and radiant with a healthy glowClean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

column9: Which skin type is it good for??£ö Normal?£ö Oily?£ö Combination?£ö Dry?£ö SensitiveWhat it is:A brightening, vitamin-C-rich gel cream that hydrates for up to 24 hours and diminishes the look of fine lines and wrinkles.Solutions for:- Dullness and uneven texture- Dryness- Fine lines and wrinklesIf you want to know more?Çª This innovative, peach-tinted gel cream instantly illuminates and delivers an energizing burst of hydration. It targets fine lines and wrinkles, renews youthful radiance, and visibly firms skin?ùbut that?ÇÖs not all. If you want to know more?ÇªA daily seven-second ritual to reveal your softest, most youthful-looking skin, delivering:
- Antiaging: pure, 98.7 percent hadasei-3, a concentrate of nourishing green tea, rice, and algae?ùJapan?ÇÖs three essential nutrients for skin health and youthful radiance.
- Smoothing and resurfacing: the natural fermentation of these nutrients produces lactic acid, helping to support natural cell turnover for improved skin texture and a smooth luster.
- Plumping hydration: instantly doubles skin?ÇÖs natural moisture content, above and beyond the results from a moisturizer, softening and plumping the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
- Maximizes performance of all skin care: skin?ÇÖs channels are flush with lasting hydration, creating a pathway to deliver treatments that follow more deeply and amplifying their effectiveness.

What else you need to know: This product is cruelty-free, non-sensitizing, non-irritating, dermatologist tested, and formulated without oil.  Geisha embraced and perfected the tradition of beauty waters as the foundation to their beauty ritual to restore and soften their skin. This secret has been passed down by generations; today, 97 percent of Japanese women use an essence. Tatcha honors this ancient practice in our modern, powerful evolution.

column2: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil
column9: What it is: An oil with 100mg full-spectrum CBD, hemp seed oil, and adaptogens to visibly calm the look of redness and nourish skin with lasting hydration.Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and CombinationSkincare Concerns: Redness, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven TextureFormulation: Lightweight OilHighlighted Ingredients:- Full-spectrum CBD (Cannabidiol): Contains a complete range of cannabinoids in addition to CBD that help CBD work more effectively utilizing what is called "entourage effect"; terpenes, naturally aromatic compounds present in full-spectrum CBD, give CBD its characteristic cannabis scent while enhancing the calming benefits of CBD; hemp-derived and organically grown in Colorado.		- Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil: Nourishing, amino acid-rich oil that restores moisture while imparting glow. 		- Ashwagandha: An herb used in Ayurvedic healing practices that help the skin cope with environmental stressors like pollution, UV rays, lack of sleep, daily stress, and more.		 Ingredient Callouts:  This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free with recyclable packaging.What Else You Need to Know: Get the most out of CBD with Emerald?ÇÖs premium organic, Colorado-grown full-spectrum CBD. The 100mg of full-spectrum CBD found in Emerald is minimally processed to leave all of the original and powerful cannabinoids from the plant in place, resulting in a CBD-rich oil that helps to calm skin. Emerald CBD Oil contains less than .3 percent THC, the psychoactive component of cannabis. The presence of THC in small amounts strengthens the "entourage effect" where cannabinoids work together to make full-spectrum CBD more effective than processed, isolated forms of CBD.Clinical Results: In a consumer testing panel of 46 testers, after 2 weeks:- 93% agreed they saw a reduction in redness - 93% agreed that their skin felt softer more hydrated - 90% agreed that their skin looked and felt better overallClean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. Solutions for:- Dryness- Fine lines and wrinkles- Loss of firmness and elasticityIf you want to know more?ÇªRenowned for its youth-preserving benefits and powerful simplicity, Josie's bestselling 100% Pure Argan Oil is nature's anti-aging, skin-smoothing superfood for the skin. Like a nourishing shield that protects skin from skin-aging free radicals and environmental damage, this 100 percent organic liquid gold oil is clinically proven to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles and improve skin smoothness and hydration. It absorbs easily into skin and is full of essential fatty acids, vitamin E, and antioxidants for unrivaled nourishing and healing benefits to create a balanced, youthful-looking complexion that glows with health. Especially great for sensitive and dry skin, this do-it-all essential can be used skin, hair, nails, and body to keep you looking and feeling beautiful from head-to-toe. 

What else you need to know:Josie's 100 percent organic Argan Oil is first cold-pressed and never heated to ensure the most powerful, highest-grade oil. It is 100 percent pure, 100 percent eco-certified organic, and free of any synthetics, fillers, or fragrance. Housed in a recyclable glass bottle and purchased from women's cooperatives in Morocco to support their social and economic welfare. These cooperatives work within a protected UNESCO biosphere reserve that ensures the protection and reforestation of Argan trees. 
The amber glass is not just for looks! Unlike clear glass, amber glass filters out damaging blue and ultra-violet light that can break down the products beneficial compounds and nutrients, ultimately reducing it's effectiveness and potency. 
This product is vegan, cruelty-free, dermatologist tested, clinically tested, and formulated without GMOs, fragrance, and formaldehyde.			
Research results:In just 4 weeks, 100% Pure Argan Oil is clinically proven to:
- Visibly improve the appearance of fine lines and coarse wrinkles
- Significantly improve skin smoothness and hydration

If you want to know more?ÇªA complete liquid silk protein forms a moisture-binding veil on the skin, while Tatcha?ÇÖs hadasei-3 complex?ùa trinity of anti-aging Japanese superfoods green tea, rice, and algae?ùrestores a healthy-looking glow. Akoya pearl extract helps support natural collagen for more supple and visibly firmer skin. The luxurious texture feels like silk without being greasy or heavy on skin. 

What else you need to know: Generations of geisha lived, slept, and bathed in silk. These beautiful artists were draped in over 12 yards of exquisite kimono silk everyday. While they did not know the science behind this lustrous fabric, a 200-year old beauty text reveals that they knew how to use silk to smooth and soften their skin. This time-honored practice to beautify the geisha?ÇÖs skin inspired The Silk Cream.This pure formula is noncomedogenic, non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA. Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls?ÇÖ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls?ÇÖ futures.?ùVictoria Tsai, Founder

This lightweight formula provides ideal protection from the sun?ÇÖs harmful, damaging rays with broad spectrum SPF 20 UVB/UVA sunscreen. Hydrolyzed wheat protein increases the hair?ÇÖs ability to retain moisture for revitalized, shiny hair with improved manageability. Avocado oil provides nourishment and smoothing from important nutrients like protein, vitamin A, D, E, B6, amino acids, folic acid, and minerals. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:  This product is formulated without MIT/MCI, artificial colors, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, aluminum, talc, and have less than one percent synthetic fragrances. It is safe for color-treated, Brazilian-treated, and keratin-treated hair.Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika?ÇÖs haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.

column2: Scalp Revival Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-exfoliating Shampoo
column9:
Which hair type is it good for??£ö Straight?£ö Wavy?£ö Curly?£ö Coiled?£ö  Tightly Coiled
What it is:A unique, charcoal- and coconut oil-infused scalp shampoo that detoxifies, exfoliates, soothes, and balances the scalp for optimal scalp health. 
Key benefits:
- Detoxifies and removes buildup
- Soothes itchy, irritated, and flaky scalp
- Hydrates the scalp to prevent dryness
If you want to know more?ÇªThis unique shampoo infuses binchotan charcoal to draw impurities from the scalp and hair follicle, providing the foundation for optimal scalp health. Vegetable-derived micro-exfoliators remove dead skin cells and product buildup to support a clean, balanced, and healthy scalp, as a cooling blend of peppermint and spearmint oils reduces scalp itchiness. Tea tree oil features anti-septic and healing properties to reduce scalp irritation, while coconut oil delivers superior moisturization to the scalp to combat and prevent dryness and flakiness. Super-vitamin panthenol provides essential nutrients to strengthen the hair roots and shaft.

What else you need to know: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without gluten, silicones, DEA, or synthetic dyes.This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
Research results: Results obtained from an independent, clinical laboratory study in which participants used the scalp shampoo over a 1-week period:

- 92% of participants with a self-assessed dry scalp indicated that the shampoo was effective in hydrating and moisturizing their scalp- 100% of participants with a self-assessed flaky scalp said the shampoo was effective at reducing flakiness- 100% of participants with a self-assessed irritated scalp said the shampoo was effective in reducing irritation- 86% of participants with a self-assessed itchy scalp said the shampoo was effective in reducing itchiness        
- 85% of participants with a self-assessed scalp buildup said the shampoo was effective at reducing buildup on the scalp            
- 88% of participants said the shampoo was effective in enhancing their scalp health      
Based on a data from a clinical measurement of scalp hydration, results revealed there is a statistically significant increase in scalp hydration after 1 use of both the Scalp Revival Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo and Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment:
- 100% of subjects showed an improvement in scalp hydration after just 1 use of both the Scalp Revival Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo and Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment

Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column10:
-Binchotan Charcoal: Detoxifies the scalp and draws out impurities that clog the hair follicle or that cause buildup on the scalp. -Coconut Oil: Moisturizes the scalp to prevent dryness and flakiness

column10:
Bumble and bumble began in 1977, as a New York City salon famed for its signature rebel-elegance. Right away, Bb. transcended hairdressing, crossing over into fashion and street-style. Like our idiosyncratic name, the brand would come to define infinite individuality. It was about more than a hairstyle. It was an attitude. We quickly clipped, colored, and styled our way into global prominence, with our like-minded salons and rock-star editorial team. Our runway looks launched global hair trends ?Çô and, in 1991, a backstage need jump-started our iconic product range. To this day, we remain passionately dedicated to the transformational power of hair.Bumble and bumble.Salon born. New York raised. Hair is what we ?Çÿdo.
Visit the Bumble and bumble boutique

If you want to know more?Çª
Curl Charisma Rice Amino Shampoo is a three-in-one formula that fights flyaways, boosts the appearance of curl definition, and provides essential moisture retention to thirsty strands. Its unique, sulfate-free formula penetrates the hair shaft to lock out frizz-causing environmental moisture, while removing dirt and buildup?ùall without stripping hair of essential oils. Tomato fruit ferment seals the cuticle to ensure hair dries consistently, allowing for uniform curl formation. Ultra-hydrating shea butter and avocado oil work to increase softness and enhance body without weighing hair down. 




What else you need to know:
 This product is formulated without gluten, silicones, DEA, and artificial dyes. It is cruelty-free, color-safe, safe for use on chemically-treated, relaxed, and keratin-treated hair, and comprised of 98 percent naturally-derived ingredients.

column9: What it is:An ultra-mild, sulfate-free shampoo that protects color integrity, prevents color fading, and helps to eliminate color washout.What it is formulated to do:This invigorating shampoo helps prevent color fading and washout while keeping tones true. By locking color in and locking water out, you can keep hues as rich as the day of your service. Color Minded seals in shine and smooths the cuticle to make hair color glow, fights the horrid humidity, and adds healthy-looking luster and luminosity?ùjust like a finishing coat.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: Formulated with a new, proprietary two-polymer technology that covalently binds to and cross-links over color-treated hair, it works to resurface the process-damaged cuticle and seal the hair to prevent color washout and fading. The color process opens the cuticle to deposit color into the hair shaft. If the cuticle is not sealed properly, water can enter and wash away new color as soon as the first shampoo (which is when the most color washout happens).Bumble and bumble is a cruelty-free brand, meaning they don't test on animals. Bb. products are free from parabens, phthalates, mineral oils, and formaldehyde.

It is safe for color-treated, Brazilian-treated, and keratin-treated hair.
Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika?ÇÖs haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. 
Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.

It's perfect for those looking to get the most out of their color by protecting it from damaging UV rays and color fading. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: This product is formulated without MIT/MCI, artificial colors, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, aluminum, talc, and have less than one percent synthetic fragrances. It is safe for color-treated, Brazilian-treated, and keratin-treated hair.Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika?ÇÖs haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.

column10:
Bumble and bumble began in 1977, as a New York City salon famed for its signature rebel-elegance. Right away, Bb. transcended hairdressing, crossing over into fashion and street-style. Like our idiosyncratic name, the brand would come to define infinite individuality. It was about more than a hairstyle. It was an attitude. We quickly clipped, colored, and styled our way into global prominence, with our like-minded salons and rock-star editorial team. Our runway looks launched global hair trends ?Çô and, in 1991, a backstage need jump-started our iconic product range. To this day, we remain passionately dedicated to the transformational power of hair.Bumble and bumble.Salon born. New York raised. Hair is what we ?Çÿdo.
Visit the Bumble and bumble boutique

column9: Which hair type is it good for??£ö Straight?£ö Wavy?£ö Curly?£ö Coiled?£ö  Tightly CoiledWhat it is:An ultra-violet, brass-busting shampoo that delivers bright and shiny, cool-toned results?ùperfect for blonde, silver, and gray color hair, whether natural or enhanced. Key benefits: - Ultra-violet formula counteracts harsh brassy tones  - Brings out color, shine, and softness in all shades of natural and color-treated hair  - Fortifies hair with nutrients like protein, vitamin A, D, E, B, amino acids, and mineralsIf you want to know more?Çª How blonde keeps its cool. Ultra-violet, brass-busting formulas let hair stay bright and light. Amika Bust Your Brass Cool Blonde Shampoo delivers bright and shiny, cool-toned results?ùperfect for blonde, silver, and gray color hair, whether natural or enhanced. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: This product is formulated without MIT/MCI, artificial colors, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, aluminum, talc, and have less than one percent synthetic fragrances. Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika?ÇÖs haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.

If you want to know more?ÇªCAVIAR Anti-Aging Replenishing Moisture Shampoo is formulated with pure caviar extract?ùrich in omega 3 fatty acids, proteins, minerals, and vitamins A, C, and D?ùto visibly improve the signs of aging hair in as little as one use. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates

Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika?ÇÖs haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.

column9: What it is: A lightweight, gel-to-foam shampoo that removes build-up, helps maintain moisture and volume, and supports balance?Çöall without stripping.Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and CoilyHair Texture: Fine, Medium, and ThickKey Benefits:  - Removes dirt, oil, and buildup- Cleanses and detoxifies without stripping- Lightweight gel-to-foam format adds moisture and restores volumeFormulation: Lightweight GelHighlighted Ingredients:- Pink Clay: Helps balance hair and scalp, while gently removing dirt and buildup.- Charcoal Powder: Helps absorb dirt, odors, harmful substances, and impurities that collect on hair; also helps cleanse pores of toxins and odors, while exfoliating dead skin cells.- Indian Cress Extract: Supports oxygen flow for a balanced, healthy scalp.Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free.What Else You Need to Know:  This unique aerosol shampoo transforms from gel to foam to cleanse, revive volume, and replenish moisture. It is formulated with pink clay and charcoal to absorb dirt, odor, buildup, and impurities, while Indian cress extract nurtures the scalp to help support a natural, healthy balance?Çöwithout stripping. Sea buckthorn berry, also known as obliphica, is included in all of amika?ÇÖs haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically, only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and supports natural collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails.
